content.raw:
Numpy 1.15 release is imminent, so I am leaning toward holding off merging this until the new numpy is released and in conda, since it includes my [patch](https://github.com/numpy/numpy/pull/10672) that removes the need for dtype_workaround.

Note to self: either add  a check_version call for numpy 1.15, or for the labscript_utils version that includes dtype_workaround.
